description: Sum of cubes of odd divisors of n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Odd Divisor Function
formula: Dirichlet g.f. (1-2^(3-s))*zeta(s)*zeta(s-3). Dirichlet convolution of (-1)^n*A176415(n) and A000578. - R. J. Mathar, Apr 06 2011a(n) = sum(A182469(n,k)^3: k=1..A001227(n)). [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 01 2012]
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
